title: The merger between Tele2 and Com Hem is completed - Tele2
snippet: Each share in Com Hem will be exchanged for 1.0374 new shares of class B in Tele2 and SEK 37.02 in cash. Com Hem shareholders will receive the Tele2 shares i.e. the non-cash merger consideration on November 7, 2018 and the cash merger consideration ...

title: Tele2 and Com Hem merger - Tele2
snippet: The merger between Tele2 and Com Hem was completed on 5 November 2018.

title: The European Commission has approved the merger of Tele2 and Com Hem - Inderes
snippet: November 2, 2018 The Swedish Companies Registration Office grants authorization to implement the merger plan and Tele2 applies for registration of the merger with the Swedish Companies Registration Office · November 5, 2018 The Swedish Companies Registration Office registers the merger and Com Hem is dissolved Admission to trading of the newly issued Tele2 shares on Nasdaq Stockholm
